tswitem.name: Signet of Displacement
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Displacement
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you use your Active Dodge, your Evade Chance is increased by 20%/40%/60% for 1.5 seconds. This Signet can be attached to Minor Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
